name: All-Purpose Stainless Steel Shower Squeegee for Shower Glass Door with 2 Adhesive Hooks, Bathroom Cleaner Tool Household Window Mirror Squeegee , Cleaning Tile Wall, Car, 10 Inch Silver
about_this_item: „ÄêStreak Free & Squeak Free„Äë: Docrok squeegee for shower glass door will effortless remove the water drops, soap scum and other sources of buildup of your shower glass door cleaner and other surfaces with just a few wipes. Getting your cleaning activities done fast and easy with no streak and squeak.

„ÄêSturdy & Durable„Äë: Made of 100% rust-resistant stainless steel and premium silicon blade, our shower squeegeee, shower door squiggy with exquisite craft ensure the durability and long lasting use for your daily household cleaning activities. A must have window squeegee for window cleaning, bathroom squeegee for shower glass doors.

„ÄêErgonomic Design„Äë: Features an ergonomic structure and precise cut silicone blade, this shower glass squeegee car squeegee provides you a comfortable anti-slip grip to efficiently clean your tile show walls with minimum time and effort.

„ÄêAll-Purpose Squeegee„Äë: This all-purpose squeegee is great for shower glass doors, tile shower walls, car windows, mirrors and any other smooth and flat surfaces. A must have cleaning tool for indoor and outdoor use.

„ÄêEasy Storage & Use„Äë: Comes with 2 kinds of waterproof adhesive hooks which can be attached to any smooth surface, you can hang the squeegee on the shower walls, kitchen and any other places for easy reach and use.
